abstract: China’s Alibaba Group is seeking investors to buy the 39 percent stake in the Internet company held by Yahoo, according to Reuters, outlining a plan that could stop Microsoft from getting the Alibaba stock.
lead_paragraph: China’s Alibaba Group is seeking investors to buy the 39 percent stake in the Internet company held by Yahoo, according to Reuters, outlining a plan that could stop Microsoft from getting the Alibaba stock.

headline.main: Alibaba Said to Shop Yahoo Stake to Avoid Micorosft’s Grasp
